text:
A Clever Explanation

Dimly lit room, tense atmosphere, two men debating.  
“Everything fits too well…”  
“Too clever! You’re too clever.”  
“But, why?”  

---  

Stranger enters, interrupting the conversation.  
“It’s too melodramatic.”  
“A-ach!”  
“Who are you?”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** The discussion reveals a convoluted explanation of events surrounding a jewel-case and the actions of individuals involved, suggesting a complex interplay of suspicion and deduction.
